item.title: An Introduction to Apple Shortcuts
item.description: When people think of iPhones, they often picture sleek hardware and user-friendly software. Of course, if you’re team Android, that’s perfectly fine—there’s no room for tribalism here. But I digress. Back to the topic at hand: one of iOS’s most underrated features is hiding in plain sight—Apple Shortcuts. This powerful app allows you to automate tasks, saving time and effort on repetitive actions. Yet despite its incredible potential, many iPhone users either tuck it away in a folder or remove it entirely.
